item.title: Create Your First Post
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to create a simple post in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. $ hugo new post/<YOUR POST NAME>.md Update meta infos- title = "Create Your First Post" description = "Quick guide for creating new posts." author = "dSecret" tags = [ "hugo", ] date = "2014-06-02" categories = [] nomenu = "main" image="" authorAvatar= "author/dSecret.
